casebody.head_matter:
458 A.2d 1355
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Darryle LLOYD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 28, 1983.
Decided May 10, 1983.
Ronald A. White, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Dennis Cohen, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
